Ron,
I looked at your friend's " boy sword "..........I am not sure if 
it's signed Kishinmaru.

More like KiOimaru to me ( my other friend that's very well versed in 
kanji agreed with me )........not sure about the spelling but it 
literally means Ghost King Maru  ( while mine  means Ghost god Maru ).

Did it pass  shinsa ?


milt
